item.title: Alicia Silverstone Mystery Drama ‘Irish Blood’ Renewed For Season 2 at Acorn TV
item.description: Acorn TV has announced the Season 2 renewal of “Irish Blood” starring Alicia Silverstone and Jason O’Mara. Season 2 will consist of six hour-long episodes and will begin production in early 2026

item.title: Telluride Awards Analysis: For Yorgos Lanthimos’ Haunting ‘Bugonia,’ Emma Stone and Jesse Plemons Are Likely Headed Back to the Oscars
item.description: Lanthimos and Stone’s prior collaborations include the Academy-embraced ‘The Favourite’ and ‘Poor Things.’

item.title: Alicia Silverstone Doesn’t ‘Wanna Mess Up’ the ‘Clueless’ Legacy With Sequel Series: ‘We Will Do Our Very Best to Honor the Original’
item.description: Alicia Silverstone wants to do right with the upcoming “Clueless” reboot. Back in April, it was announced that Silverstone would reprise her role of Cher Horowitz in a “Clueless&#822

item.title: Alicia Silverstone Teases Peacock’s ‘Clueless’ Series: “We Want to Honor” the Original Film
item.description: “I’m confident that we’ll be able to do that, but we’re in baby stages right now,” Silverstone offered as a brief update on the highly anticipated followup series.
